item.title: Families as peer workers in early childhood intervention
item.description: SM - Sylvana Mahmic MH - Melanie Hayworth SM Hi, I’m Sylvana Mahmic the CEO of Plumtree. I’m also mother to Karim who’s twenty eight and has a disability and he’s been using self-manage funding for the last ten years or so. MH And I’m Dr Melanie Hayworth. I’m a Peer Worker at Plumtree Children’s Services which is an early childhood intervention service in Australia and I have recently project managed a new project that we did with funding from the Australian Government around how peer work can be used in early childhood intervention, or ECI and the ways that families can be used to make peer work, work for ECI.
